ftbquests.chapter.industrial_foregoing.q: Sticky Resin[--粘性树脂--]
&eIndustrial Foregoing&r is a mod that mainly focuses on &6farming&r, whether that be crops, mobs, or other resources.[--&e工业先锋&r是一个主要聚焦于&6农场&r的mod,无论是作物、生物还是其它资源.--]
Most IF machines require &6Rubber&r in the recipes. The first step to getting Rubber is crafting the &bFluid Extractor&r.[--在配方中,大多数IF机器都需要&6Ruber&r.获得橡胶的第一步是制作&b流体提取器&r.--]

Place the Fluid Extractor so it is aimed at a Log, and it will &6slowly generate liquid Latex&r. This will eventually destroy the Log, so it's best to automate placing more.[--将流体提取器放置在原木上,它会&6缓慢产生液体胶乳&r。这将最终摧毁原木,所以最好自动化放置更多.--]
FE is not required, but makes it faster.[--不需要FE,但会更快.--]
Make a Latex Processing Unit[--制作一个胶乳处理单元--]
The &bLatex Processing Unit&r uses FE to &6combine Water and Latex&r into &bRubber&r![--&bLatex CPU&r使用FE将&6结晶水和胶水&r放入&bReberbber&r!--]
Make a Dissolution Chamber[--制作溶解室--]
The &bDissolution Chamber&r allows you to &6craft items together with fluid&r to make something new.[--&b溶解室&r允许你&6与流体一起制作物品&r来制作新的东西.--]
All recipes are shapeless, so the slot ingredients are in doesn't matter.[--所有配方都是无序的,所以插槽中的原料并不重要。--]
Animal Husbandry[--动物畜牧--]
Make the animal breeding machines[--制作动物繁殖机--]
The &bAnimal Feeder&r will &6feed items in its work area&r using the items in its inventory, which causes them to breed.[--&b动物喂食器&r将&6使用库存中的物品喂食其工作区域内的物品&r,这使得它们繁育.--]
The &bAnimal Baby Separator&r will &6teleport baby mobs in its work area to behind itself&r. You can set it to teleport adults instead.[--&b动物幼体分离器&r会&6将工作区域内的幼体传送到自己身后&r.你可以将其设置为传送成年生物.--]
Used together, this allows you to &6keep a pen of breeding adults&r, and automatically grab the babies that are created.[--一起使用,这可以让你&6保留一棵成年繁育之笔&r,并自动抓住所创造的幼体.--]
Then, when the babies are grown, use a second Baby Separator to teleport the adults to a third pen, ready for slaughter.[--然后,当这些幼年生物生长时,使用第二个幼年分离器将成年生物传送到第三只笔,准备屠宰。--]
Humane[--人类--]
Can't spell slaughter without laughter![--没有笑容,不能法术屠宰!--]
The &bMob Slaughter Factory&r kills mobs, &cdestroying their drops&r and instead making &6Meat&r and &6Pink Slime&r.[--&b屠宰场&r杀死怪物,&c破坏他们的掉落物&r,然后制作&6肉汤&r和&6粉红史莱姆&r.--]
Passive mobs produce more Pink Slime, so you should automate breeding them.[--被动生物产生更多的粉色史莱姆,所以你应该自动繁殖它们.--]
Make the crop farming machines[--制作作物种植机--]
The &bPlant Sower&r will &6plant seeds and saplings above itself&r.[--&b花盆汤&r会&6种植种子和树苗&r.--]
It has 9 slots, for 9 areas of the field above. For example: in a 3x3 field, each slot is a single block. In a 9x9 field, each slot is a 3x3.[--它有9个插槽,上面9个区域。例如:在3x3场中,每个插槽是一个方块。在9x9场中,每个插槽是一个3x3。--]
The &bPlant Gatherer&r &6harvests crops and trees&r in its work area. Some &6Sludge&r is created as a byproduct, and needs to be piped out.[--&b植物收集器&r&6收割其工作区域内的作物和树&r。一些&6污泥&r是副产物,需要排出.--]
By default, it &cdoes not replant&r the crops. However, it will if given some &6Ether&r.[--默认情况下,它&c不会重新种植&r作物.但是,如果给它一些&6以太&r,它会的.--]
Make a Sewer[--做个洗矿机--]
The &bSewer&r will generate &6Sewage&r while animals are in its work area.[--&b筛子&r在动物工作区域时会产生&6污水&r.--]
Sewage can be used in the &bSewage Composter&r to produce &6Fertilizer&r![--&b污水堆肥桶&r可以用来生产&6肥料&r!--]
The Sewer will also collect xp drops and turn it into &6Essence&r.[--洗矿机还会收集经验掉落物并将其转化为&6精华&r.--]
Make a Hydroponic Bed[--做个水培床--]
The &bHydroponic Bed&r will &6accelerate crop growth on top of itself&r.[--&b水晶床&r会&6加速作物生长&r.--]
It &6needs Water&r and energy to function.[--它&6需要水&r和能量才能正常工作.--]
Hey! This quest's already blue![--嘿!这个任务已经是蓝色的了!--]
The &bPity Machine Generator&r is used to make the first tier of machines.[--&b小机器发电机&r用于制作第一级机器.--]
You've definitely already made one, since the previous quest's machines also need one. This quest is just here for symmetry. I am sorry.[--你确定你已经制作了一个了,因为上一个任务中的机器还需要一个。这个任务只是为了对称性。 对不起。--]
Make a Simple Machine Frame[--制作一个简单的机器框架--]
The &bSimple Machine Frame&r allows you to craft more complex machines.[--&b简单机器框架&r允许你制作更复杂的机器.--]
Meaty Machine Frame[--肉食机器框架--]
The &bAdvanced Machine Frame&r can make even more complex machines.[--&b高级机器框架&r可以制作更复杂的机器.--]
Ex Nihil[--无中生有--]
The &bOre&r and &bFluid Lasers&r use FE to &6generate ore/fluid from nothing&r.[--&b矿石&r和&b流体激光&r使用FE来&6从空中生成矿石/流体&r.--]
Certain ores/fluids require the Laser be &6in a specific biome&r. [--某些矿石/流体需要激光&6在特定的群系中&r.--]

Additionally, to make Ether Gas, the Fluid Laser &6must be over a Wither&r. This is a bit tricky to do, but the &6Stasis Chamber&r would make it easier.[--此外,要制作以太气体,流体激光&6必须放在凋零&r上方.这有点难做,但&6堆叠室&r会更容易.--]
Laser Bases are not powered directly. Instead, a &bLaser Drill&r is placed 1 block away, and &othat&r is given power.[--激光基座不是直接供能的。相反,&b激光钻头&r被放置在1个方块外,&o那&r被给电了.--]
Laser Bases[--激光基座--]
Supremium[--终极精华--]
&bSupremium Machine Frames&r are used to craft the greatest tier of machines.[--&b终极精华机器框架&r用于制作最高级的机器.--]
Make a Plant Fertilizer[--做个植物肥料--]
The &bPlant Fertilizer&r will &6fertilize crops&r using Bone Meal or Fertilizer.[--&b施肥机&r将使用骨粉或肥料&6施肥&r.--]
Make an enchanting machine[--制作一个附魔机器--]
The &bEnchantment Factory&r will &6use Essence to enchant items&r, equivalent to 30 levels of experience.[--&b附魔工厂&r将&6使用精华附魔物品&r,相当于30级经验.--]
The &bEnchantment Extractor&r will destroy enchanted items, either moving the enchantments into Books, or converting them directly to Essence.[--&b附魔提取器&r将销毁附魔物品,或是将附魔转移到书中,或是直接转化为精华.--]
Completing either task will complete the task.[--完成任意一个任务都会完成任务.--]
Make a Mob Crusher[--做个怪物粉碎机--]
The &bMob Crusher&r will kill mobs in its working area, &6collecting the drops&r and converting the xp into &6Essence&r.[--&b怪物粉碎机&r会杀死其工作区域内的生物,&6收集掉落物&r并将xp转化为&6精华&r.--]
Optionally, you can set it to not generate Essence, and instead &6apply Looting&r.[--你可以选择将其设置为不产生精华,而不是&6施加抢夺&r.--]
Watch for flies![--观察苍蝇!--]
The &bMob Duplicator&r will &6clone a specific mob, using Essence&r.[--&b怪物复制器&r将&6使用精华&r对特定生物进行&6克隆.--]
Specify the mob by inserting a filled &bMob Imprisonment Device&r.[--通过插入一个填充的&b怪物监禁设备&r来指定生物.--]
Cursed Earth[--诅咒之土--]
&bMechanical Dirt&r will &6rapidly spawn hostile mobs&r when provided FE and &6Liquid Meat&r.[--&b动力泥土&r在提供FE和&6液态肉&r时会&6快速生成敌对生物&r.--]
If you place multiple adjacent, the Meat will be equally distributed.[--如果你放置多个相邻的肉,那么肉会平均分配.--]
Addons[--添加--]
Machine upgrades[--机器升级--]
&bAddons&r can be installed onto machines to make them work better in some way.[--&bAddons&r可以安装在机器上,使它们以某种方式更好工作.--]
&bRange Addons&r &6increase the work area&r of machines, by one additional block per tier.[--&b范围扩展&r&6每级增加一个方块来增加机器的工作区域&r.--]
The three types of &bRange Addon&r make machines &6work faster&r, in three separate ways.[--三种类型的&b范围拓展&r可以让机器&6工作得更快&r,有三种不同的方式.--]
Range Addons[--范围扩展--]
Speed Addons[--速度拓展--]
Meat Injections[--肉类注射--]
The &bMeat Feeder&r, while supplied with Liquid Meat, will &6automatically keep you fully fed&r while anywhere in your inventory.[--&b肉食喂食器&r供应了液态肉,但会&6自动保持你完全喂食&r,而你背包中的任何地方。--]
Infinity Tools[--无尽工具--]
And Beyond[--超越--]
The &bInfinity Tools&r are &6powered by Biofuel&r, but &6become more powerful the more FE they have&r.[--&b无限工具&r有&6生物燃料供能&r,但&6它们的FE越强&r就越强.--]
There are 7 tiers, each costing exponentially more FE than the previous, but also becoming exponentially more powerful.[--有7个等级,每个等级的FE消耗比上一个多成倍,但也会变得更加强大.--]
Infinity Tools[--无尽工具--]
What do you mean, Drawers exist?[--你什么意思,抽屉存在?--]
&bBlack Hole Units&r store a massive amount of a single item. Higher tiers store more.[--&b黑洞单元&r存储大量单个物品。更高的等级存储更多.--]
The same is true for &bBlack Hole Tanks&r, but for fluids instead of items.[--&b黑洞储罐&r也是一样,但流体而不是物品。--]
Black Hole Units[--黑洞单元--]
Black Hole Tanks[--黑洞储罐--]
